name: Ace
desc: This trait is active only when you have exactly 1 or 4 unique Aces.

name: A.D.M.I.N.
desc:
A.D.M.I.N. programs a custom configuration per player each game.

4 Piece Multiplier: 25%
On Cast AP: 18
On Cast AD: 18%
On Cast Chance to Drop Gold: 33%
On Cast Flat Heal: 250
On Cast Permanent HP: 12
On Kill, Unit who killed Heals: 400
On Kill, Unit who killed gains Permanent HP: 18
on dropping below 66% HP, A.D.M.I.N. gains AP: 60
on dropping below 66% HP, A.D.M.I.N. gains AD: 60
on dropping below 66% HP, A.D.M.I.N. gains AS: 60
on dropping below 66% HP, A.D.M.I.N. gains Shield: 15 sec
on dropping below 66% HP, A.D.M.I.N. gains Permanent HP: 45
on Ally Death AP: 15
on Ally Death AD: 15
on Ally Death AS: 15
on Ally Death flat Heal: 250
on Ally Death Gold Chance: 20%
on Ally Death Permanent HP: 10
Combat Start chance to drop Gold: 50%
Combat Start permanent HP: 40
Every 5 sec, A.D.M.I.N. gains AP: 20
Every 5 sec, A.D.M.I.N. gains Mana: 40
Every 5 sec, A.D.M.I.N. chance to drop Gold: 25%
Every 5 sec, permanent HP: 10
Combat Start, Team gains permanent HP: 20
Combat Start, Team gains chance to drop Gold: 25%
Combat Start, Team gains max HP Shield: 25%
every 5 sec, Team gains Mana: 20
every 5 sec, Team chance to drop Gold: 15%
every 5 sec, Team gains permanent HP: 6
every 5 sec, Team heals: 150
stats: [Add another effect to the program]. Boost all tiers by 25%
abstract:
总结为:
team:HP:(20),GoldDrop:(25%),Shield:(25%),MP:(20),GoldDrop:(15%),HP:(6),Heal:(150);
bond:AP:(18),AD:(18%),GoldDrop:(33%),Heal:(250),HP:(12),Heal:(400),HP:(18),AP:(60),AD:(60),AS:(60),Shield:(15s),HP:(45),AP:(15),AD:(15),AS:(15),Heal:(250),GoldDrop:(20%),HP:(10),GoldDrop:(50%),HP:(40),AP:(20),MP:(40),GoldDrop:(25%),HP:(10)
说明:
1. 团队增益(team)包括战斗开始时和每5秒的效果
2. 羁绊内增益(bond)包括各种触发条件和效果
3. 由于stats中没有明确的数值提升描述，主要根据desc中的效果进行总结
4. 4件套效果(25%提升)和6件套效果(100%提升)没有具体说明提升哪个属性，故未在总结中体现

name: Aegis
desc: Your team gains bonus Magic Resist, and Aegis units gain more.

name: Anima Squad
desc:
Anima Squad members pose after champion kills, increasing their fame. Each point of fame grants 5 permanent Health to each Anima Squad member.

They also gains:

name: Brawler
desc: Brawlers gain additional maximum Health.

name: Spellslinger
desc: Every 5 seconds, the next attack instead fires a magic orb at a random target, which explodes for 50% Ability Power as magic damage.

name: Sureshot
desc: Combat start: gain bonus Attack Damage now, and every 4 seconds.

name: Defender
desc: Your team gains bonus Armor, and Defenders gain more.

name: Duelist
desc:
Innate: increased movement speed.

Duelists' basic attacks grant bonus Attack Speed, up to 12 stacks.
stats: +10% Attack Speed per stack, Duelist take 10% less damage
+16% Attack Speed per stack, Duelist take 20% less damage

name: Mecha: PRIME
desc:
Use the Mecha selector item to choose a PRIME.

Combat start: the PRIME combines with the 2 nearest Mecha, absorbing 90% of their Health.
stats: The PRIME gains 60 Ability Power and 60% Attack Damage
All Mechas gain 55 Ability Power and 55% Attack Damage; The PRIME gains double this amount.

name: Gadgeteen
desc: Each round, Gadgeteens create random modified weapons with powerful effects that fall apart after one round. Gadgeteens also gain Damage and Damage Reduction for each item equipped to them.
abstract: bond:Create item:(1/2), per item:(4% DMG & DMG Reduction/8% DMG & DMG Reduction)

name: Quickdraw
desc: After every 2 damaging ability projectiles, Quickdraw units fire a bonus ability projectile. Bonus shots deal:

name: Hacker
desc:
Hackers gain Omnivamp and summon a H4ckerr!m. Any unit placed in the rider hex will be sent to the enemy backline and is untargetable for the first 2 seconds of combat.

Omnivamp: heal for a percentage of damage dealt
stats: +20% Omnivamp for Hackers, +15% for the rider.
+40% Omnivamp for Hackers, +30% for the rider.

name: Heart
desc: When Heart units cast their Ability, your team gains stacking Ability Power for the rest of combat.

name: Mascot
desc:
Your team heals a percentage of their maximum Health every 2 seconds, and Mascots heal double the amount.

When Mascots die, they retreat to the sidelines to cheer on your team. Your team's healing increased by 1% for each cheering Mascot.

name: Ox Force
desc: Ox Force units gain bonus defenses. Once per combat, when they would drop below one HP, they instead shield themselves for 50% of their maximum health for 1.5 seconds.

name: Parallel
stats:
Ezreal learns from his older, more handsome self and joins him in future adventures.

Ezreal's Ability becomes a blast that hits all enemies in a line.

Ultimate Ezreal's Ability summons two additional temporal duplicates.

name: Prankster
stats: Once per combat at 50% Health, spawn a target dummy, move to a safe location, and restore 150 Health.
And, Prankster dummies stun the enemy that killed them for 1.5 seconds.
The Health restore is increased to 350 Health and the stun duration become 2 second.
abstract: bond:once per combat at 50% HP:spawn dummy,move,restore HP(150/350),prankster dummy stun(1.5s/2s)

name: InfiniTeam
desc:
The InfiniTeam opens a portal to an alternate timeline. At the start of combat, any InfiniTeam unit placed on a portal summons an alternate version of themself with different items. They get 1 for each Augment you own.

The copies have reduced Health and damage.

name: Renegade
desc: Renegade units deal bonus damage, and the last sone standing deals more.

name: Riftwalker
desc:
Riftwalkers open a gap between dimensions and summon their ally Zac, who grows in power based on the star level of Riftwalkers.

Zac gains the last-listed Trait of the closest Riftwalker.

name: LaserCorps
desc:
When a LaserCorp agent attacks or is hit by an attack, their combat drone deal magic damage to the agent's target (0.4 second cooldown). When a LaserCorps agent dies, their drone is reassigned to the nearest living agent.

Drones lasers deal:
stats: 35 magic damage. All units get a LaserCorp drone.
55 magic damage. All units get a LaserCorp drone.
80 magic damage. All units get a LaserCorp drone.
abstract: bond:magic damage:(27/35/55/80); team:all units get a LaserCorp drone:(2/3/4)

name: Star Guardian
desc: Gain more Mana from all sources.

name: Supers
stats: Combat start: strike a pose that grants your team 18% bonus damage, which increases by 3% for every 3-star champion on your team.

name: Underground
desc: The Underground must sneak through the sewers and crack 10 locks to open a vault. When the vault opens, you may choose to take the loot now, or attempt another heist for even better rewards.
stats: Crack 2 vault lock after a player combat win, and 3 after a player combat loss
Crack 2 vault lock after a player combat win, and 4 after a player combat loss
Crack 3 vault lock after a player combat win, and 5 after a player combat loss
Crack 4 vault lock after a player combat win, and 7 after a player combat loss
